description: The lily of the Incas, Alstroemeria 'Jupiter', is an amazing plant. Its vibrant pink and white flower petals are breathtaking, adding color and life to any garden or home. Its stems can reach up to three feet tall, and their signature trumpet-shaped blooms will attract birds, butterflies, and other pollinators. In addition to its beauty, this species thrives in almost any soil and can even survive in dry or cold climates, making it a great choice for gardeners in a variety of locations.
